    • Method Detail

      • disposeAfterTestMethod

        protected SPage disposeAfterTestMethod(SPage page)
        Utility method to ensure, even on test failure, the SPage object is correctly closed (i.e. "driver.quit()" is invoked).
        Parameters:
        page - SPage to dispose after the test.
        See Also:
        disposePagesAfterTestMethod()

      • disposePagesAfterTestMethod

        protected void disposePagesAfterTestMethod()

      • createOpenAndSelfDisposingPage

        protected SPage createOpenAndSelfDisposingPage(SEnvConfig envConfig,
                                   java.lang.String driverName,
                                   SPageConfig pageConfig,
                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> pathParams,
                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> queryParams)
        Factory method to create an SPage that is already .open() AND registered via disposeAfterTestMethod(SPage). Use this method when you know you don't need to set anything extra on the page before "opening" it.
        Parameters:
        envConfig - Sulfur Environment Configuration
        driverName - Name of the WebDriver you want to use (see SWebDriverFactory)
        pageConfig - Page Configuration
        pathParams - Map of Path Parameters to use
        queryParams - Map of Query Parameters to use
        Returns:
        Newly created SPage, already open and registered for self disposal

      • createOpenAndSelfDisposingPage

        protected SPage createOpenAndSelfDisposingPage(java.lang.String envName,
                                   java.lang.String driverName,
                                   java.lang.String pageName,
                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> pathParams,
                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> queryParams)
        See createOpenAndSelfDisposingPage(sulfur.configs.SEnvConfig, String, sulfur.configs.SPageConfig, java.util.Map, java.util.Map).
        Parameters:
        envName - Sulfur Environment Configuration Name
        driverName - Name of the WebDriver you want to use (see SWebDriverFactory)
        pageName - Page Configuration Name
        pathParams - Map of Path Parameters to use
        queryParams - Map of Query Parameters to use
        Returns:
        Newly created SPage, already open and registered for self disposal

      • provideConfiguredPages

        protected java.lang.Object[][] provideConfiguredPages()
        DataProvider of all the Page Configs found by the SPageConfigFactory. Name of the DataProvider is "provideConfiguredPageConfigs"
        Returns:
        DataProvider bi-dimensional array with list of all Page Configs (SPageConfig) that were found

      • provideConfiguredEnvs

        public java.lang.Object[][] provideConfiguredEnvs()
        DataProvider of all the Env Configs found by the SEnvConfigFactory. Name of the DataProvider is "provideConfiguredEnvConfigs"
        Returns:
        DataProvider bi-dimensional array with list of all Env Configs (SEnvConfigs) that were found

      • provideConfiguredDriverNamesByEnv

        protected java.lang.Object[][] provideConfiguredDriverNamesByEnv(SEnvConfig envConfig)
        Returns DataProvider-friendly dataset of Driver Names (based on Sulfur Configuration). It's ideal to be used to implement a DataProvider for a specific SEnvConfig.
        Returns:
        DataProvider bi-dimensional array with list of Drivers to use for the test

        Parameters:

        Returns:
